attributes.action: Stop the Human Rights abuses against British Citizen, Peter Ellis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the torture, stalking, workplace abuse, assaults of British citizen Peter Ellis cease. That all falsified work records, personnel records, files and   statements concerning Peter Ellis are withdrawn. That internet stalking and personal harassment of Peter Ellis ceases. That Peter Ellis is able to earn his living as appropriate to his skills and abilities with non abusing colleagues. That those responsible for a serious life threatening assault are brought to justice as are those that covered it up.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
